title: Crypto regulations still in play as U.S. lawmakers push for inclusion in year-end legislation
description: As the year comes to a close, U.S. lawmakers are actively seeking to incorporate cryptocurrency-related measures into the final legislative packages of 2023. While some industry insiders suggest that more substantial action may occur in 2024, there are ongoing efforts to integrate crypto provisions into year-end bills. description: The Pentagon has announced significant advancements under the AUKUS pact involving the United States, the United Kingdom, and Australia. This tripartite defense-technology agreement is set to revolutionize the landscape of military capabilities, focusing on cutting-edge developments in artificial intelligence (AI), autonomy, electronic warfare, hypersonics, and quantum technologies.
